title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1722.4 - Traveling expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1722.4 - Traveling expenses

State Regulations

Committees will not be allowed for
traveling beyond actual disbursements, necessarily incurred. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
1722.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
